NB:
From this point on. Lunch and Dinner Hours are not listed
in the schedule. Lunch Hour is pretty consistently
12 N to 1:30 P. M., while Dinner Hour is from the end
of the 3:00 P. M. session (usually 4:30 or 4:45) to
7:00 P. M.
